title: Motivational Strategies in Physical Education Using a Constraint-Led Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic motor skills and general experience in physical education activities
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, optimized for mobile learning as participants do not own PCs

learning_goals: Learners meet 80% or more of the three basic psychological needs (autonomy, competence, relatedness) through CLA-based activity design.
Learners analyze CLA application cases in mobile microlearning environments and propose three or more motivation strategies.
Learners design one CLA-based physical education scenario within a week and achieve 4+ points (5-point scale) in peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
